table.name: project
table.content:
Why I made this project

This is a website I built initially to store links of tutorials, documentations and download links for my robotics team so that the programmers don not need to spend time searching for these links. There are also some tutorials I made for the new programmers.

Later, I shared this website with some other teams. And their programmers found it helpful as well.

Challenges

It's a simple website and I used Materialize a lot. So the development process was quick and easy.

Thing I learned

I realized how much time libraries can save, so I stopped coding everything from scratch.
